verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G1859>feast<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> the Feast of <S%G4634>Booths,<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> at <S%G1451>hand.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> no <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G4160>does<s%> <S%G5100>anything<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2927>secret,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2212><s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G2212>seeks<s%> to be <S%G1511>known<s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3954>openly.<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> you <S%G4160>do<s%> these <S%G5023>things,<s%> <S%G5319>reveal<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> to the <S%G2889>world.<s%>"

<S%G2532>There<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G1112>murmuring<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G3588%G99999>Some<s%> <S%G3754>said,<s%> "He <S%G2076>is<s%> a good <S%G18>man.<s%>" <S%G243>Others<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3756>"Not<s%> <S%G235>so,<s%> but he leads the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G4105>astray.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> when it was <S%G2235>now<s%> the <S%G3322>midst<s%> of the <S%G1859>feast,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1321>taught.<s%>

<S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G2309>desires<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2307>will,<s%> he will <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G1322>teaching,<s%> <S%G4220>whether<s%> it <S%G1473>is<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> if <S%G1473>I<s%> am <S%G2980>speaking<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1683>myself.<s%>

He who <S%G2980>speaks<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G2212>seeks<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> he who <S%G2212>seeks<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of him who <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3778><s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G227>true,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G1325>Didn't<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> yet <S%G3762>none<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G4160>keeps<s%> the <S%G3551>law?<s%> <S%G5101>Why<s%> do you <S%G2212>seek<s%> to <S%G615>kill<s%> <S%G3165>me?<s%>"

<S%G1487>If<s%> a <S%G444>boy<s%> <S%G2983>receives<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G4521>Sabbath,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3089>may<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> be <S%G3089>broken,<s%> are you <S%G5520>angry<s%> with <S%G1698>me,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G4160>made<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3650>completely<s%> <S%G5199>healthy<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G4521>Sabbath?<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1492>Behold,<s%> he <S%G2980>speaks<s%> <S%G3954>openly,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> to <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G3379>Can<s%> it be <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G758>rulers<s%> <S%G230>indeed<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> truly the <S%G5547>Christ?<s%>

<S%G235>However<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4159>where<s%> this <S%G5126>man<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G1161>from,<s%> but <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2064>comes,<s%> no <S%G3762>one<s%> will <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G4159>where<s%> he comes <S%G2076>from.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%> out <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> <S%G2532>teaching<s%> and <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1492>"You<s%> <S%G2504>both<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G2504>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4159>where<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G2532>from.<s%> I <S%G2064>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G1683>myself,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> he who <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G228>true,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G1492>know.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G3754>said,<s%> <S%G3752>"When<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G3385>comes,<s%> he <S%G4160>won't<s%> do <S%G4119>more<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> than <S%G5130>those<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5130>this<s%> man has <S%G4160>done,<s%> will he?"

The <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G1111>murmuring<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G5257>officers<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G4084>arrest<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G846%G99999><s%> <S%G1510>"I<s%> will be <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G5550>while<s%> <S%G2532>longer,<s%> then I <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> him who <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me.<s%>

The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G4226>"Where<s%> <S%G3195>will<s%> this <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2147><s%> <S%G3756>won't<s%> <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3361>him?<s%> Will <S%G3195>he<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1290>Dispersion<s%> among the <S%G1672>Greeks,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1321>teach<s%> the <S%G1672>Greeks?<s%>

<S%G1722>Now<s%> on the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G3588>and<s%> <S%G3173>greatest<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> of the <S%G1859>feast,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%> <S%G3004>out,<s%> <S%G1437>"If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> is <S%G1372>thirsty,<s%> let him <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4095>drink!<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2036>he<s%> said <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> those <S%G4100>believing<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3195>were<s%> to <S%G2983>receive.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G3754>given,<s%> because <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1392>wasn't<s%> <S%G3764>yet<s%> <S%G1392>glorified.<s%>
